00023 #include "chipstream/QCProbesetOptions.h"

00031 QCProbesetOptions::QCProbesetOptions() {
00032   m_exprAnalysisString="quant-norm.target=1000.sketch=50000,pm-only,median";
00033   m_hasLigationBase=false;
00034   m_tempdir=".";
00035   useNames = false;
00036 }
00037 
00038 // Private utility function to parse groups
00039 bool QCProbesetOptions::SplitGroups(std::string& str,std::string& val,const char sep)
00040 {
00041   int index = str.find_first_of(sep);
00042   if(index == -1) {
00043     val = str;
00044     return false;
00045   }
00046   val = str.substr(0,index);  
00047   str = str.substr(index+1,str.size()-index);
00048   return true;
00049 }
00050 
00051 // Static method to read in a QCCFile and populate QCProbesetOptions
00052 void QCProbesetOptions::readQCCFile(const std::string &qccFileName, QCProbesetOptions &opts) {
00053   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00054   //int lines_out=0;
00055 
00056   if ((tsv.open(qccFileName)) != affx::TSV_OK) {
00057     Err::errAbort("Failed to open '" + qccFileName);
00058   }
00059 
00060   // vars to bind
00061   int probeset_id = -1;
00062   int quantification_in_header = -1;
00063   std::string group_names="";
00064   std::string probeset_name="";
00065   std::string ligation_base="?";
00066 
00067   //
00068   tsv.bind(0, "probeset_id",              &probeset_id,              affx::TSV_BIND_OPTIONAL);
00069   tsv.bind(0, "group_name",               &group_names,              affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00070   tsv.bind(0, "probeset_name",            &probeset_name,            affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00071   tsv.bind(0, "quantification_in_header", &quantification_in_header, affx::TSV_BIND_OPTIONAL);
00072   tsv.bind(0, "ligation_base",            &ligation_base,            affx::TSV_BIND_OPTIONAL);
00073 
00074   // Is the primary key probeset_id or probeset_name?
00075   std::string primaryKey;
00076   if(tsv.getHeader("primary_key",primaryKey) != affx::TSV_OK) {
00077     opts.useNames = false;
00078     ///@todo check that probeset_id was bound
00079   }
00080   else if (primaryKey == "probeset_name") {
00081     opts.useNames = true;
00082   } 
00083   else {
00084     Err::errAbort("Invalid primary key '" + primaryKey + "' found. Expecting 'probeset_id' or 'probeset_name'.");
00085   }
00086 
00087   if (tsv.cname2cidx(0,"ligation_base")>=0) {
00088     opts.m_hasLigationBase=true;
00089   }
00090   else {
00091     opts.m_hasLigationBase=false;
00092   }
00093     
00094   // get the column values for each method
00095   int rv;
00096   while ((rv = tsv.nextLevel(0))==affx::TSV_OK) {
00097 
00098     if (opts.useNames && probeset_name == "") {
00099       Err::errAbort("Invalid probeset_name (empty)");
00100     }
00101     if (!opts.useNames && probeset_id < 1) {
00102       Err::errAbort("Invalid probeset_id '" + ToStr(probeset_id) + "'. Expecting integer greater than 0.");
00103     }
00104     if (group_names == "") {
00105       Err::errAbort("Invalid group_name (empty)");
00106     }
00107 
00108     // figure out what groups this probeset belongs to
00109     std::vector<std::string> group_name_vec;
00110 
00111     ///@todo AW: This block should go, or otherwise only be executed if the parsing of ligation bases from probeset names was requested.
00112     if (!opts.m_hasLigationBase) {
00113       APT_ERR_ASSERT(probeset_name!="","name required.");
00114       // If it has any of these, then it isnt the correct type.
00115       if (Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"AG_",1) ||
00116           Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"AC_",1) ||
00117           Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"GT_",1) ||
00118           Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"CT_",1)) {
00119         APT_ERR_ABORT("QCAnalysisOptions::CreateMultiChannelNonOverlapCelListener: "
00120                       "Found SNPs when expecting non-polymorphic probesets."
00121                       "'"+probeset_name+"'");
00122       }
00123       //
00124       if (Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"A_",1) || Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"A")) {
00125         ligation_base="A";
00126       }
00127       else if (Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"C_",1) || Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"C")) {
00128         ligation_base="C";
00129       }
00130       else if (Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"G_",1) || Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"G")) {
00131         ligation_base="G";
00132       }
00133       else if (Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"T_",1) || Util::endsWithStr(probeset_name,"T")) {
00134         ligation_base="T";
00135       }
00136       else {
00137         // Non falcon, eg SNP6 chips hit this point...
00138         //APT_ERR_ABORT("Ending not recognized.");
00139       }
00140     }
00141 
00142     // put 
00143     Util::chopString(group_names,' ',group_name_vec);
00144     for(int i=0; i<group_name_vec.size(); i++) {
00145       if (!opts.useNames) {
00146         probeset_name=ToStr(probeset_id);
00147       }
00148       //
00149       opts.probesetGroups[group_name_vec[i]].push_back(std::pair<std::string,std::string>(probeset_name,ligation_base));
00150     }
00151 
00152     //
00153     //if (lines_out++<100) {
00154     //Verbose::out(1,"QCC: "+ToStr(lines_out)+":"+probeset_name+":"+ligation_base);
00155     //}
00156 
00157     // Quantification in CHP header
00158     if(quantification_in_header > 0) {
00159       if(opts.useNames) 
00160         opts.headerProbesets.push_back(probeset_name);
00161       else
00162         opts.headerProbesets.push_back(ToStr(probeset_id));
00163     }
00164     //
00165     ligation_base="?";
00166   } // while
00167 
00168   if (rv != affx::TSV_OK && rv != affx::TSV_ERR_EOF && rv != affx::TSV_ERR_FILEIO) {
00169     Err::errAbort("Failed to read line: " + tsv.getError());
00170   }
00171   tsv.close();
00172 }
Generated on Tue Jul 15 2014 10:37:35 for Affymetrix Power Tools by  1.7.1
